comment: This class has so much material. We can only have one cheat sheet (front and back), so it's almost impossible to fit everything on there. There were 6 labs, 4 research assignments, two tests, and a final. She only allows test corrections for half credit only if most of the class does bad. Other than the tests, she is okay at best.

Stay away if at all possible. While she is a sort of nice person, she didn't teach us anything aside from how to read directly off of the lecture slides. She also isn't very clear about what she wants you to do and sometimes changes her mind without telling the class. 10/10 would not recommend
rating_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS--GROUP PROJECTS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She is not very clear on what she wants for labs and is way too harsh in grading. Doesn't explain what you did wrong on tests and labs. Wasn't very helpful in labs. Lectures are terrible and boring. I did not learn anything from this course. I would not recommend this professor.

Gets off topic far too much. She hasnt updated her D2L webpage since spring 2016 leading for a lot of confusion because many of the due dates have dates that have already passed. Not particularly helpful or relevant. If you can avoid her class, I would suggest doing so.
Avoid taking her class if you can! The grading was unfair I wonder if she has a standard for grading ? I took the hybrid course , for the online parts she taught nothing at all

don't take her class if you have any other choice. She's a harsh grader. I wonder if she has a standard for grading?  the lecture is so so. I took the hybrid course and she taught nothing for the online part.
Her class was no cake walk, thats for sure. But you will learn a lot if you pay attention to her slides and ask her a lot of questions.

She wasn't easy and you have to go to class to do well. She is however a fair professor and she is incredibly smart when it comes to her field. Hardest I've ever worked to get an A. Don't take her if your an unmotivated student, you wont last in her class.
Very combative with students and Very unhelpful answering questions. Terrible class to take. Do not take her classes.
My computer froze when I tried to register for her class. Should of taken the hint...

Worst Professor at this school. I had her for Test Engineering. A good grade is easy, listen to the slides for when she finally says somthing realating to the class. Of all the professors at this school I learned the least from her. Never answered one question about LabView. I am not even sure if she is compotent in LabView. Trust my number rating.
I did not much care for her class. Southern Tech keeps trying to be more like Georgia Tech. So aerocerebral that they're barely accredited.
Just read her slides and handouts for her test. The labs and test are straight forward and easy. Easy on the eyes and easy class.

The class was PCIexpress. I enjoyed it because it takes all the stuff you learned in  data comm and puts it to use, so you get a better feel for that stuff. The lectures were clear and the tests were for the most part straight forward.
I enjoyed her class. She is a hard professor to follow, but do all of the homework plus some, read the chapters and you should be fine.

She is by far the one of the hardest professors at this school, but she knows the material very well. If you want to do well in her class ask her lots of questions. Her class isn't one of those you can just breeze through and manage a good grade. Avoid her if you can.

Had her for Test Eng. Not as bad as the comments say. Lectures are boring, text book is useless after the first couple of labs. Put a little effort in and its an easy A. Tests are all essay style questions. Labs are fun though.
Frinzi was hired on the quota system not because she has anything to contribute to education.

if you do not have to take her class, give you favor.- do not. boring, talk to much. grade is based mosly on how  much you talk to her.I hope she retire soon. She talk to much about subjet that has nothing to do with the class
No Comments
I had no problems she was great for me.
You will regret taking her classes.
She's sucks she needs to retire and live in the bush not with regular people. dont think of taking her you will fail the class.
Test Grading are really unfair

The manterial is fun, and the software is fun.  The projects were fun.  I would ahve loved the class if it weren't for the unfair grading of the tests.  Correct responses don't necessarily mean you will get credit.
Proof the SIR evaluatin process has nothing to do with anything, otherwise this woman woud have been shown the door years ago
I am not looking forward to our next encounter.
Substandard

Weeding students out by challenging them or by the instructor's gross incompetence, the result is the same. Unfortunately you tend to weed out the wrong people. When is the department going to do something about this woman
Lord, just let me get through this semester so I never have to look at her again!

She is the worst professor I have ever had the opportunity to take.  The picks fights, and tries her best to make you feel like your very stupid.  Unfortunately, she makes herself look stupid in the process.
No Comments

One of the worst professors in my educational career.  Is she still allowed to teach?  School administration should "catch on" before she's allowed tenure.  Unfriendly, mean, selfish and just a poor instructor.  (and I did well in her class!
combative, tenured, incompetent. Three strikes and we're out...
Drop the class when you see her. Frinzi doen't help, she will send you to notes from previous classes.
